<title level="1" pfs="">[Grave Robber](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3424)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Many cultures have a tradition of burying their dead with a selection of the deceased's most precious possessions. Such valuables can be easy pickings for those with no respect for—or fear of—the dead.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Grave_Robber.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Grave Robber](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3424)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 18

**Perception** +5

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +2, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +2, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +5, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
embalming flask, [Holy Water](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245), shovel

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shovel +6,
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
embalming flask +7 ([Alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 1d4 acid plus 1 acid splash damage and alchemical embalming

**Alchemical Embalming**   The grave robber carries alchemical vials of specially prepared embalming fluid meant to hinder pursuit by anyone who interrupts their grave-robbing. A creature hit by a grave robber's embalming flask takes a –10-foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 round. On a critical hit from an embalming flask, the target is also [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) for 1 minute.

</column>
